titleStmt.title: Submission to the will of God in times of affliction asserted, in a sermon from I Sam. 3. 18 / by a Reverend Divine.
titleStmt.author: Sylvester, Matthew, 1636 or 7-1708.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Matthew Sylvester. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
